commitStep.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the commitment step in mentor registration
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step (H2 heading)
**When Users See This**: When mentors reach the commit step of registration
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Commit to being a good mentor"
commitStep.description:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory paragraph about mentoring values
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When mentors reach the commit step of registration
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Mentoring on Exercism can be an incredible experience for students and mentors alike. To ensure it remains a positive place for everyone, we ask all mentors to affirm Exercism's values before they mentor their first solution."
commitStep.youAgreeTo:
**Functional Purpose**: Sub-heading for the list of mentor commitments
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step (H3 heading above checkboxes)
**When Users See This**: When mentors reach the commit step of registration
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "You agree to:"
commitStep.beKind:
**Functional Purpose**: Checkbox label for agreeing to be patient, empathic, and kind
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step (checkbox label)
**When Users See This**: When mentors are reviewing commitments
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Be patient, empathic and kind to those you're mentoring"
commitStep.noAgendas:
**Functional Purpose**: Checkbox label for agreeing not to promote personal agendas
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step (checkbox label)
**When Users See This**: When mentors are reviewing commitments
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Not use Exercism to promote personal agendas"
commitStep.back:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to go back to the previous step
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step (back button)
**When Users See This**: When mentors decide to revisit previous steps
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Back"
commitStep.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to proceed to the next step
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step (continue button)
**When Users See This**: When mentors have checked all commitments and are ready to proceed
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Continue"
